LanguageData.PsychoidPekoe.label: psychite pekoe
LanguageData.PsychoidPekoe.description: A fragrant tea infused with psychoid leaves. Drinking it induces a subtle psychite euphoria. This tea is easy to produce, but can psychite psychoid addiction if consumed too often.\n\nMany tribes use psychoid tea, both as a daily energizer and as part of social and religious rituals.
